issue.title: platform.openai.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

n/a

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://platform.openai.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The AdGuard Annoyances filter incorrectly blocks the help chat on platform.openai.com.  Disabling it fixes the chat.

The specific filter is `||widget.intercom.io^$3p,from=~app.rezi.io|~artisthub.io|~backerclub.co|~green.energy|~intercom.com|~quidco.com` which blocks `https://widget.intercom.io/widget/dgkjq2bp`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://instagram.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. AdGuard breaks Instagram scrolling; ad removal makes the page jump back to a previous post and you can't scroll past it. Disabling AdGuard fixes the problem.

2. Can't show with screenshot, see attached screen recording

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7212610/226141501-1651b875-7792-45b4-8641-6dc4408308d1.mp4


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Chrome

Desktop

https://platform.openai.com/

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

The AdGuard Annoyances filter incorrectly blocks the help chat on platform.openai.com.  Disabling it fixes the chat.

The specific filter is `||widget.intercom.io^$3p,from=~app.rezi.io|~artisthub.io|~backerclub.co|~green.energy|~intercom.com|~quidco.com` which blocks `https://widget.intercom.io/widget/dgkjq2bp`

comment.body:
I think that the JS rules can be merged into one rule because such type of elements must be existed only one element.
```suggestion
spoint.spox.com#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(-1==document.cookie.indexOf('spx')){var a=new MutationObserver(function(){var b=document.querySelector('.message-component button[title="Accept"], .message-component button[title="Zustimmen"]');b&&(a.disconnect(),b.click())});a.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){a.disconnect()},1E4)}});
```
Suggested change: `.message-component button[title="Accept"]` and `.message-component button[title="Zustimmen"]` => `.message-component button[title="Accept"], .message-component button[title="Zustimmen"]`

### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version uBlock Origin 1.48.2 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://eksisozluk.com ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList, Fanboy's Annoyances, Peter Lowe's Blocklist ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. eksisozluk.com domain was updated to eksisozluk2023.com due to the recent government block to the website. Now eksisozluk.com redirects to eksisozluk2023.com so the old website specific filters do not work, such as a double clicking problem due to a certain ad class. It is uncertain what the owners will do when the government blocks this domain as well, but for now, replacing eksisozluk.com with eksisozluk2023.com should be enough. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1 (can't really show the double click problem, but here's the new domain:

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://eksisozluk.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Feksisozluk.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @fossmanbill > eksisozluk.com domain was updated to eksisozluk2023.com due to the recent government block to the website. Now eksisozluk.com redirects to eksisozluk2023.com so the old website specific filters do not work, such as a double clicking problem due to a certain ad class. It is uncertain what the owners will do when the government blocks this domain as well, but for now, replacing eksisozluk.com with eksisozluk2023.com should be enough. ### Screenshots

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons ‚Äî share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances ‚Äî pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

#147135

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

- https://sg.trip.com
- https://us.trip.com

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

Now eksisozluk.com redirects to eksisozluk2023.com so the old website specific filters do not work, such as a double clicking problem due to a certain ad class. It is uncertain what the owners will do when the government blocks this domain as well, but for now, replacing eksisozluk.com with eksisozluk2023.com should be enough. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/BufB9oH.png)

issue.title: support.ring.com chat is broken
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

Chrome 111.0.5563.147 (Official Build) (64-bit) on Windows with uBlock 1.48.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://support.ring.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036196372-Contact-Us

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy, Web Annoyances Ultralist, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, I don't care about cookies, NoCoin Filter List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Visit: https://support.ring.com/hc/en-us/articles/360036196372-Contact-Us

2. Click on "Chat with Us"

3. No pop-up nothing happens.

4. This is what it looks like broken:
<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12159404/229623749-e3c40eb9-e3c9-40ee-b1b9-06c4a1a0cabf.png)
</details>
And fixed:
<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12159404/229624070-aa5309ee-c02a-4431-923d-4520c926e417.png)
</details> 

5. I was able to fix it with: 
`@@||cdn.solvvy.com/deflect/customization/$script,domain=support.ring.com`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
